Method Detail

available

public static boolean available()
Determine if this class is usable on this system

Returns:
true if you can use this class to read links and create them.

Returns:

_relative

public static String _relative(File from,
                               File to)
Gets a relative path from one file to another. for example: from=/Users/me/test.txt to=/Users/you/temp.txt return=../temp.txt

Parameters:
from - The starting point
to - The target
Returns:
A relative path from from to to

                                  File link,

                           throws IOException,
                                  InterruptedException
Creates a link.

Parameters:
target - The file to point to
link - The link file
absoluteLink - If true, the contents of link will be absolute, otherwise relative
Returns:
The contents of the newly created link file
Throws:
IOException - On errors reading from command line output
InterruptedException - If the command was interrupted

Test.
